metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5383 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Roundcube Webmail 1.1.x before 1.1.2 allows remote attackers to obtainsensitive information by reading files in the (1) config, (2) temp, or (3)logs directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5383` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1').
